caption: Wall Street posts blockbuster year: Annual profits ($bn)
trend_summary: The chart shows the combined annual profits for JPMorgan Chase, Bank of America, Wells Fargo, Citigroup, Goldman Sachs, and Morgan Stanley from 2007 to 2024. Profits saw a significant dip around the 2008 financial crisis, followed by a general upward trend. A peak was reached in 2021, followed by a decline in 2022 and 2023, and a strong recovery in 2024 to approximately $142bn, the second-highest level in the period shown.
author: Stephen Gandel
article_title: Biggest US banks notch up $142bn in profits in blockbuster 2024
